data.title: KARAOKE
data.text: This place is so authentic, western. I have been going to this bar/restaurant for many many years. back in the 70's I visited quite frequently for burgers and beers. but nowadays when you go in for karaoke on Thursday nights it is awesome. the original bar isd still there as are some of the furnisheings!! real cool place to stop. great food, staff, patrons. TRY IT!!!!

data.title: Great local bar
data.text: This is a place to go to be away from the riff raff scene. The bar has it's regulars and the beer is always fresh and cold.

data.title: Ultimate Dive Bar
data.text: If you are looking to be apart of the local crowd in Waterbury, then you have found the right place. Food is only served at the end of the week so don't come with an empty stomach.
